Racket, Gauche, MIT, Gambit, Chicken, Bigloo, Kawa, SISC, Chibi, Chez, !Ikarus/Vicare, STklos, KSi, Rep, Oaklisp, Owl Lisp all understand `|...|` syntax.

Scsh, Guile, SCM, NexJ, Shoe, !TinyScheme, Dream, Scheme 7, BDC, Elk, UMB, VX treat `|` as an ordinary
identifier character.

Scheme48, Larceny, Ypsilon, Mosh, !SigScheme, RScheme, XLisp, Schemik all report syntax errors.

!IronScheme gets hung up reading characters from the input.
